Body: Im exploring Kaa IoT Community edition for my IoT Project. I have gone through Kaa Basic DataCollection Demo and Created Kaa Sample Application, compiled and Run on Linux with Kaa IoT C SDK. As of now I have learned Kaa IoT Endpoint SDK Application. I want to extend the project for Multiple Endpoint interfaced with a Center Gateway(Actor Gateway), and want Gateway to communicate with Kaa IoT Server. Im want to use RaspberryPi as Actor Gateway and Modbus devices as an EndPoints. I have searched for it and found some information(Actor Gateway for Kaa Server - Java based
column9:
Building Java based Kaa actor gateway) which gives basic idea about the approach but not any example code to get started.

I need to understand that How I can register Endpoints from single Kaa IoT SDK Application and manage Endpoints.

Any comments which can show forward path are highly appreciable.

"
